msbt.message: My clothes have to do two things: they gotta show off my muscles, and they gotta soak up a LOT of sweat.
I get all my clothes a size too small. Why be swole if you don't show it off? Kinda uncomfortable though
The only reason I even wear clothes is to highlight my muscles!<10_4 /> And stay warm.<10_4 /> And not get sunburned.
I told them I wanted to look ripped, and they just gave me a bunch of torn up clothes,
The tailors here are pretty awesome.I wanna launch a pro career. They're gonna make sure I'm wearing the right gear!
There's only one thing that makes muscles look better than clothes from the tailorsMORE muscles!
I was sprinting to the new tailor shop when I ripped my shirt on a branch How's that for timing, ?
You been by the new tailor shop? It's awesome, !There's all kinds of low-friction, muscle-highlighting, breathable, sweat-wicking stuff to try on!
I'm super pumped to finally have a tailor shop here.I've been pumping so much iron I'm worried I'm gonna explode out of my shirts, !
